channel.title: Dicing for PI
channel.description: Ok so I want to add dicing to my server. And found a tut in tutorial section, but there is like 4 people in there saying alot of diffrent things. So if someone can help me this will be great.

item.title: Dicing for PI
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

oh geez :rolleyes: dont make me blush

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing for PI
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“imstrength, post:5, topic:463589”]add this to your commands.java if you’d like…

} //Made by Imstrength if (playerCommand.startsWith("dice")) { if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("It's not a good idea to do this in the Wilderness."); return; } c.sit = false; if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.forcedText = "I'm not a donator so i cannot use dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("You must be a donor or a mod to dice!!!!"); } if(c.playerRights == 2) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("you roll the dice..."); } if(c.playerRights == 3) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("you roll the dice..."); } if(c.playerRights == 1) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("you roll the dice..."); } if(c.playerRights == 4) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("you roll the dice..."); } }[/quote]
Those conventions are sexy as fuck.

Read full topic

item.title: Dicing for PI

item.description:

add this to your commands.java if you’d like…

} //Made by Imstrength if (playerCommand.startsWith("dice")) { if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("It's not a good idea to do this in the Wilderness."); return; } c.sit = false; if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.forcedText = "I'm not a donator so i cannot use dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("You must be a donor or a mod to dice!!!!"); } if(c.playerRights == 2) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("you roll the dice..."); } if(c.playerRights == 3) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("you roll the dice..."); } if(c.playerRights == 1) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("you roll the dice..."); } if(c.playerRights == 4) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("you roll the dice..."); } }

item.title: Dicing for PI
item.dc:creator: @EvoIllusions EvoIllusions
item.description:
@EvoIllusions wrote:

[quote=“alltimenewb, post:3, topic:463589”]I have decided to scrap the dicing idea. I already have 2 forms of gambling through a npc so don’t really need it. as trying to get it for other people who wanted it on the source when they download. I tried about 5 different tuts and snippets and none work.[/quote]Still unsolved? Give me TV Details.

Read full topic
